altername_name: DS Nishimura Kyotaro Suspense 2 Shin Tantei Series: Kanazawa, Hakodate, Gokkan no Kyoukoku: Fukushuu no Kage
name: DS Nishimura Kyotaro Suspense 2 Shin Tantei Series
overview: DS Nishimura Kyotaro Suspense 2 Shin Tantei Series is an Adventure game, developed and published by Tecmo, which was released in Japan in 2008.
